channel.title: [508]i0wnuall's Progression (Updated 2/5/09) New Pictures
channel.description:
Hello, I'm starting this post to track and show my progression of my 508 Server. [b][u]First and Foremost. I AM USING BLUBY'S SERVER.[/u][/b] But do not be alarmed i am not Leeching...I'm totally reconstructing it, i thought it would be a great base to build upon, isn't that what he released it for? Eh? :) Okay onto the good stuff.
[ul][li]1. I update the Server at least once a day.[/li] [li]2. No my server is not opened yet, nor will i open it if you ask me to, i will open it when I'm ready to.[/li] [li]3. Follow all Forum rules Yada yada yada, :)[/li][/ul]
[s][b][u]First Project: SUMMONING[/u][/b] 1. Making all summoning Familiars help you in a skill. ( As everyone should know, Bulby's skill are Medium paced so Summoning will help these skills go quicker.)
2. Get some summoning pets into the game along with a whole new summoning shop.(meaning there will be 2 different shops)
3. Integrate some sort of use of Spirit Shards into summoning to make it a little more costly and a little bit harder then normal.[/s][u][b]TAKING A BREAK![/b][/u]
[b][u]Project Two: Organize and Update[/u][/b] - Updating all things needed, as in new items, new combat equipment, new bonuses, new weapon effects (poison)!
[hr]
Submit your ideas for the new Summoning Monsters! Click here: [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338998.0.html]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338998.0.html[/url]
[hr] [b][u]Pictures:[/u][/b] New Summoning Monsters (This is just 3 of them) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/km0rk.jpg[/img]
New Summoning Shop Addition (ADDED!) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6tnxwk.jpg[/img]
The Modified Summoning Shop [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/149n6a.jpg[/img]
Ancients (all Attacking spells work (Tele's do not): [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/52f03t.jpg[/img]
Poisoning [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1055g5e.jpg[/img]
[[[More Pictures Coming Soon!]]]
[hr] [b][u]Updates:[/u][/b] 1/15/09 - Added 2nd summoning shop, going to hold more pouches and some pets ;)! - Added some Teleports effects. 1/16/09 - Added new Pets (Sara. Owl, Zam. Hawk, Guth. Raptor) 1/18/09 - 23% of Server done. - Forums Added and being formed. 1/21/09 - Poison added to DD(p++)! - Full Ancients! (Freezing/Healing) 1/22/09 - Auto-Restarter Added (Every ONE Hour) 1/24/09 Fixing Bugs 1/29/09 - LD and HD compatible. - Magic cannot be casted in SafeZones. - PvP Drops (Still working on making it random drop) - ::starter is abolished from server (Made it so it adds 600 coins to your inventory when you start) 2/5/09 - New custom quest added (The Renewal of Guthix) [hr]
Please post what you think! Do not hold back, be brutally honest , but remember, Forum rules!

item.title: [508]i0wnuall's Progression (Updated 2/5/09) New Pictures
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“Gods army, post:15, topic:256698”][quote author=i0wnuall link=topic=339033.msg2629716#msg2629716 date=1232064817]
Hello, I’m starting this post to track and show my progression of my 508 Server.
First and Foremost. I AM USING BLUBY’S SERVER.
But do not be alarmed i am not Leeching…I’m totally reconstructing it, i thought it would be a great base to build upon, isn’t that what he released it for? Eh?
Okay onto the good stuff.

[ul][li]1. I update the Server at least once a day.[/li]
[li]2. No my server is not opened yet, nor will i open it if you ask me to, i will open it when I’m ready to.[/li]
[li]3. Follow all Forum rules Yada yada yada, :)[/li][/ul]

[s]First Project: SUMMONING

  1. Making all summoning Familiars help you in a skill. ( As everyone should know, Bulby’s skill are Medium paced so Summoning will help these skills go quicker.)

  2. Get some summoning pets into the game along with a whole new summoning shop.(meaning there will be 2 different shops)

  3. Integrate some sort of use of Spirit Shards into summoning to make it a little more costly and a little bit harder then normal.[/s]TAKING A BREAK!

Project Two: Organize and Update

  • Updating all things needed, as in new items, new combat equipment, new bonuses, new weapon effects (poison)!

[hr]

Submit your ideas for the new Summoning Monsters!
Click here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338998.0.html

[hr]
Pictures:
New Summoning Monsters (This is just 3 of them)

New Summoning Shop Addition (ADDED!)

The Modified Summoning Shop

Ancients (all Attacking spells work (Tele’s do not):

52f03t.jpg762×501

Poisoning

[[[More Pictures Coming Soon!]]]

[hr]
Updates:
1/15/09

  • Added 2nd summoning shop, going to hold more pouches and some pets ;)!
  • Added some Teleports effects.
    1/16/09
  • Added new Pets (Sara. Owl, Zam. Hawk, Guth. Raptor)
    1/18/09
  • 23% of Server done.
  • Forums Added and being formed.
    1/21/09
  • Poison added to DD(p++)!
  • Full Ancients! (Freezing/Healing)
    1/22/09
  • Auto-Restarter Added (Every ONE Hour)
    1/24/09
    Fixing Bugs
    [hr]

Please post what you think!
Do not hold back, be brutally honest , but remember, Forum rules!
[/quote]

stop using bulby…

looks basic to bulby server, just looks like shop and npc added.
the barrage with the “you have frozen your opponent” is easy as ****… its just a (p, “send message here”); oo now lets do something hard

hopefully you can understand this

p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "you are frozen by" + p.username);

oo hard lelz

phatt server = pwnage… use it… just nobody is actually using it to full potential yet. (cept phatt)[/quote]Espeon is the only good 508 base.

Read full topic

thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 05:27:15 am[/size][hr][quote=“Master Monk, post:2, topic:256698”]how about the new pheonix?[/quote]

But, i was thinking about maybe MAYBE, integrating to a 508+…
But I’m still thinking. Cause i really want to perfect this 508.

Hello, I’m starting this post to track and show my progression of my 508 Server.
First and Foremost. I AM USING BLUBY’S SERVER.
But do not be alarmed i am not Leeching…I’m totally reconstructing it, i thought it would be a great base to build upon, isn’t that what he released it for? Eh?
Okay onto the good stuff.

[ul][li]1. I update the Server at least once a day.[/li]
[li]2. No my server is not opened yet, nor will i open it if you ask me to, i will open it when I’m ready to.[/li]
[li]3. Follow all Forum rules Yada yada yada, :)[/li][/ul]

[s]First Project: SUMMONING

  1. Making all summoning Familiars help you in a skill. ( As everyone should know, Bulby’s skill are Medium paced so Summoning will help these skills go quicker.)

  2. Get some summoning pets into the game along with a whole new summoning shop.(meaning there will be 2 different shops)

  3. Integrate some sort of use of Spirit Shards into summoning to make it a little more costly and a little bit harder then normal.[/s]TAKING A BREAK!
